snippet: No woman has piloted an airplane more than Mrs. Johnson, who flew 5.5 million miles and the equivalent of more than six and a half years in flight hours.
abstract: Evelyn Bryan Johnson, aviator who flew 5.5 million miles over a career and set a record for flight hours, dies at age 102.
lead_paragraph: No woman has piloted an airplane more than Mrs. Johnson, who flew 5.5 million miles and the equivalent of more than six and a half years in flight hours.

headline.seo: Evelyn Johnson, Pilot Who Set Records, Dies at 102
headline.main: Evelyn B. Johnson, Pilot and Instructor, Dies at 102
headline.print_headline: Evelyn B. Johnson, Pilot And Instructor, Dies at 102
